PHRASE.LANG: kName
Imperial Snowtrooper Suit
Combinaison Snowtrooper Impérial
Imperialer Schneetruppen-Anzug
Costume Snowtrooper Imperiale
Traje de Snowtrooper imperial
帝国軍スノー・トルーパー・スーツ
제국 스노우트루퍼 수트
Imperial Snowtrooper Suit
帝國雪地兵的裝束
帝國雪地兵的裝束
Imperial Snowtrooper Suit
kDesc

This is the outfit of the Imperial stormtrooper who is trained to operate in arctic climates. These guys were some of the best. You'd have to be to withstand some of the places these guys went. Does the Battle of Hoth ring any bells?[#Legal]

La tenue du Stormtrooper Impérial entraîné à opérer sous les climats arctiques. Ils font partie des meilleurs. Vous devez l'être pour supporter certains des endroits où ils ont été. La Bataille de Hoth vous rappelle-t-elle quelque chose ?[#Legal]

Das ist das Outfit der imperialen Schneetruppen, die ausgebildet sind, um im arktischen Klima zu operieren. Sie sind die Besten. Das muss man sein, um Orte auszuhalten, an denen sie waren. Erinnert die Schlacht von Hoth an etwas?[#Legal]

Questo è il costume di un soldato dei reparti d'assalto che è stato allenato per operare nei climi artici. Questi soldati erano i migliori. Dovresti sfidare uno di questi posti dove sono andati. La Battaglia di Hoth ti dice qualcosa?[#Legal]

Este es el traje del stormtrooper imperial entrenado para operar en climas árticos. Estos tipos eran de los mejores, tendrías que probar algunos de los sitios a los que han ido estos chicos. ¿Te suena la Batalla de Hoth?[#Legal]
厳寒の気候下で活動するよう訓練された帝国軍スノートルーパーのスーツ。まさしく精鋭部隊である。彼らの行った場所で生存するのは並みのことではない。ホスの戦いを憶えているかな？[#Legal]
극한 기후 작전수행 훈련을 받은 제국 스톰트루퍼의 의상. 말하자면 최정예 병사들이랍니다. 이들의 공격에 저항하는 건 쉽진 않겠죠. 호스 전투 때 기억 안 나세요?[#Legal]

This is the outfit of the Imperial stormtrooper who is trained to operate in arctic climates. These guys were some of the best. You'd have to be to withstand some of the places these guys went. Does the Battle of Hoth ring any bells?[#Legal]
一襲給訓練有素，專門在酷寒氣候中執行任務的帝國雪地兵之裝束；有最精良的裝備，才能承受住嚴酷的任務環境條件。想到霍斯戰役了嗎？[#Legal]
一襲給訓練有素，專門在酷寒氣候中執行任務的帝國雪地兵之裝束；有最精良的裝備，才能承受住嚴酷的任務環境條件。想到霍斯戰役了嗎？[#Legal]

This is the outfit of the Imperial stormtrooper who is trained to operate in arctic climates. These guys were some of the best. You'd have to be to withstand some of the places these guys went. Does the Battle of Hoth ring any bells?[#Legal]
